## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style (`make lint` passes)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] No `console.log` or debug statements left in
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated if public API/usage changed
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Spec updated if implementation differs from plan

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data committed
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] Error messages don't leak sensitive info

### Deployment
- [ ] Changes are backwards compatible (or migration documented)
- [ ] Environment variables documented in `.env.example` if added
- [ ] AWS resources don't violate cost guardrails (no provisioned concurrency)
